description: This file defines a React-like component using Qwik framework that provides a modal dialog for creating or editing notes. It manages internal state for note fields, reacts to note prop changes, and handles user interactions for saving or canceling.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Initializes a Qwik component with given props, managing dialog display, form inputs, and save/cancel actions.

methods.name: useSignal
methods.description: Creates reactive signals for form input states (title, content, tags).

methods.name: useTask$
methods.description: Tracks note prop changes and updates signals accordingly.
